task_description: Task to reset an online password

must_have: Allow access to account recovery options through trusted contacts
View a password strength indicator during reset
nice_to_have: Receive an instant alert of the password reset request
Provide feedback on password strength during the reset process
Enable two-factor authentication for added security
Include tips for creating a secure password
deal_breakers: Password reset link expires too quickly
Forgot password option leads to a dead end

decision_factors: User familiarity with online security protocols
Time required to complete the reset process
